pixi.core.textures.VideoBaseTexture

type
class
extends
BaseTexture
metadata
:native
"PIXI.VideoBaseTexture"

Static Methods

fromUrl(videoSrc : String, ?scaleMode : Int) : VideoBaseTexture

parameters
videoSrc {string|object|string[]|object[]} The URL(s) for the video.
[videoSrc.src] {string} One of the source urls for the video
[videoSrc.mime] {string} The mimetype of the video (e.g. 'video/mp4'). If not specified the url's extension will be used as the second part of the mime type.
scaleMode {number} See {@link SCALE_MODES} for possible values
returns
{VideoBaseTexture}
Mimic Pixi BaseTexture.from.... method. This can be used in a couple ways, such as: ```js var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrl('http://mydomain.com/video.mp4'); var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrl({ src: 'http://mydomain.com/video.mp4', mime: 'video/mp4' }); var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrls('/video.webm', '/video.mp4'); var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrls(
          { src: '/video.webm', mime: 'video/webm' },
          { src: '/video.mp4', mime: 'video/mp4' }
); ```

fromUrls(videoSrc : Array<String>, ?scaleMode : Int) : VideoBaseTexture

fromVideo(video : js.html.VideoElement, ?scaleMode : Int) : VideoBaseTexture

parameters
video {HTMLVideoElement}
scaleMode {number} See {@link SCALE_MODES} for possible values
returns
{VideoBaseTexture}
Mimic Pixi BaseTexture.from.... method.

Constructor

new(source : js.html.VideoElement, ?scaleMode : Int)
parameters
source {HTMLVideoElement}
[scaleMode] {number} See {@link SCALE_MODES} for possible values
A texture of a playing Video. Video base textures mimic Pixi BaseTexture.from.... method in their creation process. This can be used in several ways, such as: ```js var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrl('http://mydomain.com/video.mp4'); var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrl({ src: 'http://mydomain.com/video.mp4', mime: 'video/mp4' }); var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrls('/video.webm', '/video.mp4'); var texture = PIXI.VideoBaseTexture.fromUrls(
          { src: '/video.webm', mime: 'video/webm' },
          { src: '/video.mp4', mime: 'video/mp4' }
); ``` See the "deus" demo(http://www.goodboydigital.com/pixijs/examples/deus/).

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

hasLoaded : Bool

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
Set to true once the base texture has successfully loaded. This is never true if the underlying source fails to load or has no texture data.

height : Float

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
The height of the base texture set when the image has loaded

imageUrl : String

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture

isLoading : Bool

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
Set to true if the source is currently loading. If an Image source is loading the 'loaded' or 'error' event will be dispatched when the operation ends. An underyling source that is immediately-available bypasses loading entirely.

mipmap : Bool

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
Set this to true if a mipmap of this texture needs to be generated. This value needs to be set before the texture is used Also the texture must be a power of two size to work

premultipliedAlpha : Bool

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
Controls if RGB channels should be pre-multiplied by Alpha (WebGL only)

resolution : Float

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
The Resolution of the texture.

scaleMode : Int

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
The scale mode to apply when scaling this texture

source : Dynamic

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
The image source that is used to create the texture.

width : Float

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
The width of the base texture set when the image has loaded

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

destroy() : Void

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
Destroys this base texture

dispose() : Void

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
Frees the texture from WebGL memory without destroying this texture object. This means you can still use the texture later which will upload it to GPU memory again.

loadSource(source : String) : Void

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
parameters
source {Image|Canvas} the source object of the texture.
Load a source. If the source is not-immediately-available, such as an image that needs to be downloaded, then the 'loaded' or 'error' event will be dispatched in the future and `hasLoaded` will remain false after this call. The logic state after calling `loadSource` directly or indirectly (eg. `fromImage`, `new BaseTexture`) is: if (texture.hasLoaded) { // texture ready for use } else if (texture.isLoading) { // listen to 'loaded' and/or 'error' events on texture } else { // not loading, not going to load UNLESS the source is reloaded // (it may still make sense to listen to the events) }

update() : Void

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
Updates the texture on all the webgl renderers.

updateSourceImage(newSrc : String) : Void

inherited from pixi.core.textures.BaseTexture
parameters
newSrc {String} the path of the image
Changes the source image of the texture. The original source must be an Image element.
